ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Any news about Tinkering Patch
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/30/00 3:14:57 AM Pacific Daylight Time, ... they ... Man they just fixed poison and it s nothing but a money sink now and does less
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/30/00 3:14:57 AM Pacific Daylight Time,
Xillitil@... writes:

> gotta love verant...now i gotta decide if i should spend the 12k i got
> saved, and practice now, or wait and see it tinkering gets cheaper when
they
>
> 'fix' it :(

Man they just "fixed" poison and it's nothing but a money sink now and does
less damage then before. Screw the trade skills, they won't ever be worth
anything, spend your 12k on some combat thing you want. This game will
always be EverCamp.

Kaens Furryfoot
hafling, but I love gnames =)
